follow_up_questions.selected_insight: Solomon Islands consistently has the highest number of employed persons across key economic sectors including Agriculture and Fishing, Social Work and Health, and Construction.

follow_up_questions.selected_insight: Male employees contribute a significant share of total employment, notably exceeding a quarter in major sectors like Agriculture and Fishing, Electricity and Gas, and Construction, as well as in countries such as Vanuatu and Solomon Islands.
selected_facts: The Sex Male accounts for 34.42% of the Number of employed persons when Economic sector is Agriculture and Fishing.
The Sex Male accounts for 27.06% of the Number of employed persons when Economic sector is Electricity and Gas.
The Sex Male accounts for 26.81% of the Number of employed persons when Economic sector is Construction.
The Sex Male accounts for 29.88% of the Number of employed persons when Pacific Island Countries is Vanuatu.
The Sex Male accounts for 32.25% of the Number of employed persons when Pacific Island Countries is Solomon Islands.
